actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision limiting nonbusiness casualty loss deductions to the amount by which such losses exceed 10 percent of adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the provision limiting the nonbusiness casualty deduction to the amount by which such losses exceed ten percent of adjusted gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the provision limiting nonbusiness casualty loss deductions to the amount by which such losses exceed 10 percent of adjusted gross income.
